messages.title: THE BEST CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION
messages.content: Mims and Theresa May - Delivering strong leadership in the national interest.

messages.title: STRONG & STABLE LEADERSHIP
messages.content: Only Mims and Theresa May's Conservatives can provide the strong and stable leadership that Eastleigh and the United Kingdom need at this important time.

messages.title: MIMS PROTECTING GREEN SPACES AND ANCIENT WOODLAND
messages.content: Mims is opposed to the Liberal Democrat Local Council's Local Plan to build on Green Spaces and Ancient Woodland.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making a success of Brexit for the local area - no second referendum.
Holding the local Lib Dems to account for their failure to provide a Local Plan resulting in uncontrolled housing developments on green spaces.
A strong and stable economy with 2.9 million new jobs, taxes cut for 31 million people and record low unemployment rates.
Working hard over the last two years as your MP to bring the Eastleigh Constituency the transport infrastructure that we need to alleviate congestion and improve air quality.

issues.brexitEurope: Making a success of Brexit for the local area - no second referendum.

images.caption: Election Special leaflet with Mims Davies and Theresa May pictured, along with various messages, issues, and policies.
